item.description:
Hi,

A couple of members have recommended Hei La Moon (http://www.hiddenbost...) in Boston for Dim Sum. Who's up for a trip to Beantown? We can meet in the late AM and carpool. An email with a meeting location will be sent to those who rsvp yes.

If you can drive, please indicate in your response.

Passengers can chip in some $ for gas and parking. Parking is above the restaurant for $6 all day. Since gas is low, carpooling is much more affordable than taking the train, and we'll have a flexible schedule.

As long as 10 people sign up, I can make a reservation otherwise we have to wait for a table to open.

Since we will be sharing the food, we can split the bill. Please pay for your own drinks.

For those of you who are wondering what is dim sum, check this out http://en.wikipedia.o....

I tried dim sum for the first time last year, and I'm hooked. Yummy:)
item.name: Dim Sum Boston Style
